snippet: The decision to dissolve RIA Novosti, along with its international radio broadcaster, came as a complete surprise and signaled a major state media reorganization in Russia.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin exerts new control over state news media; dissolves by decree one of Russia's official news agencies, RIA Novosti, along with its international radio broadcaster as he continues drive to strengthen Kremlin's influence; decision comes as complete surprise and signals a major state media reorganization in Russia.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth and Patrick Reevell contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The decision to dissolve RIA Novosti, along with its international radio broadcaster, came as a complete surprise and signaled a major state media reorganization in Russia.

headline.main: Without Notice, Putin Dissolves a News Agency
headline.print_headline: Without Notice, Putin Dissolves A News Agency
